# Use Twitter V2 API to authenticate using credentials in file /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/twitter_keys.txt

import os
import requests

API_KEY = "your_api_key_here"
API_SECRET_KEY = "your_api_secret_key_here"
ACCESS_TOKEN = "your_access_token_here"
ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET = "your_access_token_secret_here"

bearer_token_url = 'https://api.twitter.com/oauth2/token'
bearer_token_headers = {
    'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=UTF-8',
    'Authorization': 'Basic '+os.environ['TWITTER_BEARER_TOKEN']
}
bearer_token_data = {
    'grant_type': 'client_credentials'
}

bearer_token_response = requests.post(bearer_token_url, headers=bearer_token_headers, data=bearer_token_data)
bearer_token = bearer_token_response.json()['access_token']

headers = {
    "Authorization": f"Bearer {bearer_token}"
}

response = requests.get("https://api.twitter.com/2/users/2244994945", headers=headers)

print(response.json())
